overview_of_class:
Basic facts and principles of human communication and its disorders.
Participation in or review of current research is included in this introduction to human communication science.
name: Sound and Communication Health
title: SoC CSD 108-0-20 Sound and Communication Health
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Students who have previously taken or are currently registered for CSD 318-0, 320-0, or 373-0 are not permitted to also register for CSD 108-0.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Basic facts and principles of human communication and its disorders.
Participation in or review of current research is included in this introduction to human communication science.
